front.title: Recommendation on Stable IPv6 Interface Identifiers

abstract.t: This document changes the recommended default Interface Identifier generation scheme for SLAAC to that specified in RFC7217, and recommends against embedding link-layer addresses in IPv6 Interface Identifiers. It formally updates RFC2464, RFC2467, RFC2470, RFC2491, RFC2492, RFC2497, RFC2590, RFC3146, RFC3572, RFC4291, RFC4338, RFC4391, RFC4944, RFC5072, and RFC5121, which require IPv6 Interface Identifiers to be derived from the underlying link-layer address. Additionally, this document provides advice about the generation of Interface Identifiers with Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol version 6 (DHCPv6) (thus updating RFC3315) and manual configuration.
